Package com.taco.suit_lady.util.tools

Class BindingTools.RecursiveBinding<U,​V>

java.lang.Object
com.taco.suit_lady.util.tools.Bind.RecursiveBinding<U,​V>
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.beans.binding.Binding<V>, javafx.beans.Observable, javafx.beans.value.ObservableValue<V>
Enclosing class:
BindingTools
public static class BindingTools.RecursiveBinding<U,​V> extends Object implements javafx.beans.binding.Binding<V>
Allows you to bind an ObservableValue to a dynamic Binding.

Example Class 1: 


 public static class ExampleClass1
 {
      private final ObjectPropertyExampleClass2 selectedExampleProperty;

      public ExampleClass1(ExampleClass2 selectedExampleClass2) {
          this.selectedExampleProperty = new SimpleObjectProperty<>selectedExampleClass2);}
      }

      ... Assumed to have standard Property methods ...
 }
Example Class 2: 

 public static class ExampleClass2
 {
      private final StringProperty nameProperty;

      public ExampleClass2(String name) {
          this.nameProperty = new SimpleStringProperty (name);
      }

      ... Assumed to have standard Property methods ...
 }

Example Usage: 


 ExampleClass2 example1 = new ExampleClass2("Example 1");
 ExampleClass2 example2 = new ExampleClass2("Example 2");
 ExampleClass1 exampleClass1 = new ExampleClass1(example1);

 Binding<String> recursiveNameBinding = Properties.recursiveBinding(ExampleClass2::nameProperty, exampleClass1.selectedExampleProperty());
 recursiveNameBinding.addListener((observable, oldValue, newValue)-> System.out.println("Changing Value - [" + oldValue + "-> " + newValue + "]"));

 example1.setName("New Name (Example 1)");
 exampleClass1.setSelectedExample(example2);
 example1.setName("Another New Name (Example 1)");
 example2.setName("New Name (Example 2)");
 exampleClass1.setSelectedExample(example1);

    • function

      public javafx.beans.property.ObjectProperty<Function<U,​javafx.beans.value.ObservableValue<V>>> functionProperty

  • Constructor Details

    • RecursiveBinding

      protected RecursiveBinding​(Lock lock, Function<U,​javafx.beans.value.ObservableValue<V>> function, javafx.beans.value.ObservableValue<U> updateObservable, javafx.beans.Observable[] updateBindings)
      Constructs a new RecursiveBinding object.
      Parameters:
      lock - The ReentrantLock used for this RecursiveBinding. Specify null to not use a ReentrantLock.
      function - The Function used to retrieve a new ObservableValue when the updateObservable changes.
      updateObservable - The ObservableValue that calls the Function upon changing.
      updateBindings - Any additional Observables that should trigger an update (call to the Function) upon changing. Optional.
      See Also:
      }, }
